project_descr: Strengthened capacity of the BiH government to a) formulate, implement and monitor programmes with a social inclusion perspective; b) to produce quality reports on economic and social policy issues; and c) to develop appropriate strategic plans

outputs.output_descr: Strengthened capacity of the BiH government to formulate, implement and monitor programmes with a social inclusion perspective, produce quality reports on economic and social policy issues and to develop appropriate strategic plans

project_title: support to bih social inclusion policy development
